result.arabic_text: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ
result.translation: Gurguddoon isaan (mushrikoota) irraa ta’an deemaniiti “deemaa gooftolee keessan (gabbaruu) irratti obsaa; dhugumatti, inni kun wanta nurraa barbaadamuudha" (waliin jedhan).
